titles.title: Gas Tax bill
Freedom from Unfair Energy Levy Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend all motor fuel taxes for six months, and to permanently repeal the 4.3-cent per gallon increases in motor fuel taxes enacted in 1993.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/29/2000--Introduced. Freedom from Unfair Energy Levy Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) suspend, for six months, motor fuels taxes; and (2) repeal the 1993 4.3 cents per gallon increase in motor fuel taxes. Sets forth floor stock provisions.
